tool_description: Manages call overflow scenarios by detecting capacity thresholds and triggering alternative routing or callback options.

current_wait_time.description: Current average wait time in minutes

queue_length.description: Number of calls currently in queue

overflow_threshold_time.description: Wait time threshold for overflow action (minutes)

overflow_threshold_length.description: Queue length threshold for overflow action

callback_enabled.description: Whether callback option should be offered

priority_calls_only.description: Apply overflow only to high priority calls

error_messages: Queue not found: The specified queue ID does not exist.
Invalid threshold values: Thresholds must be positive numbers.
Alternative queue unavailable: One or more alternative queues not operational.
Negative wait time: Current wait time cannot be negative.
Invalid queue length: Queue length must be a non-negative integer.
usage: Provide queue_id, current_wait_time, and queue_length. Set overflow thresholds, alternative_queues, and options for callback and priority handling to control overflow behavior.

recommended_action.description: Suggested overflow action: route_alternative, offer_callback, increase_capacity

severity_level.description: Overflow severity: low, medium, high, critical
